original_title: 苺のジャムとマーガリン
overview: My favourite people taste like strawberry jam and margarine. How do high school students express themselves during this sensitive period when they experience daily joys and pains? Photography, drawing, fiction, theatre. The film depicts boys and girls dealing with their current emotions and sensations using a variety of techniques.
tagline: Even the cobbler is special: the richness of teenage sensibility overflows!
title: Strawberry jam and margarine
